schema.description: The detail result information of on-demand LM function.

lm-result.description: The detail result information of on-demand LM function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

local-send-pkt-count.description: The count of local sending packets.

local-recv-pkt-count.description: The count of local receiving packets.

local-discard-pkt-count.description: The count of local lossing packets.

local-discard-pkt-ratio.description: The ratio(*1000000) of local lossing packets.

remote-send-pkt-count.description: The count of remote sending packets.

remote-recv-pkt-count.description: The count of remote receiving packets.

remote-discard-pkt-count.description: The count of remote lossing packets.

remote-discard-pkt-ratio.description: The ratio(*1000000) of remote lossing packets.

schema.description: The detail result information of on-demand DM function.

dm-result.description: The detail result information of on-demand DM function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

avg-delay-variation-ratio.description: The ratio of average delay variation(units: 1/1000000).

schema.description: The detail result information of LB function.

lb-result.description: The detail result information of LB function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

send-count.description: The count of sending LB packets.

recv-count.description: The count of receiving LB packets.

discard-count.description: The count of lossing LB packets.

format-error-count.description: The count of receiving format error LB packets.

schema.description: The detail result information of LT function.

lt-result.description: The detail result information of LT function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

if-success.description: The result of Link trace for MEP, failed or success.

success-hop-count.description: Successful hops of LT, it used to analysis MIP ID sequence.

hop-sequence.description: comma-separated list of string for successful  MIP ID.

schema.description: The detail result information of TST function.

test-result.description: The detail result information of TST function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

rcv-count.description: The count of receiving TST packets.

discard-count.description: The count of lossing TST packets.

band-width.description: The bandwidth from source MEP to destination MEP, that the TST function detected.

global.description: Configure MPLS-TP OAM of global info.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off MPLS-TP OAM function(default: enable).

mel.description: The value of MEL field in OAM packets, ranges from 0 to 7(default: 7).

channel-type.description: The identify of Y.1731 packet in G-ACH Label, ranges from 1 to 65535(default: 32762).

tc.description: The value of TC field in the label of GAL, ranges from 0 to 7(default: 7).

rdi-to-sf.description: This switch used to transform the RDI alarm to SF alarm.

statistic-time.description: The value of reporting interval of statistic functionality, ranges from 5s to 60s(default: 5s).

ais-speed.description: AIS fast or slow packets config.

csf-speed.description: CSF fast or slow packets config.

ais-period.description: The period carried in the AIS frame,including 1s,and 1min (defaut: 1s).

fei-period.description: The sending period of FEI packets, ranges from 1 to 5(units:s, default: 1).

node-id.description: The node ID is used to identify the MIP.

delay.description: The delay time, ranges from 0 to 60(units:min, default: 0).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

section-id.description: Section ID used to identify the section entity.

sta-tunnel.description: Configure MPLS-TP OAM of static tunnel.
Configure MPLS-TP OAM of static tunnel.

tunnel-id.description: The identity of static tunnel,the upper limit of this parameter depend on the device.

lsp-id.description: The identity of the static LSP.

dyn-tunnel.description: Configure MPLS-TP OAM of  dynamic tunnel.
Configure MPLS-TP OAM of  dynamic tunnel.

lsp-role.description: The LSP role of dynamic tunnel, including master LSP and slave LSP.

tunnel-num.description: The identity of dynamic tunnel,the upper limit of this parameter depend on the device.

sta-mtunnel.description: Configure MPLS-TP OAM of static P2MP tunnel.
Configure MPLS-TP OAM of static P2MP tunnel.

mtunnel-id.description: The identity of static P2MP tunnel.

lsp-id.description: The identity of the static P2MP LSP.

meg-id.description: MEG identity name, ranges from 0 to 13 characters. If MEG ID is not configrued, the length of string is 0.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off MEG function(default: disable).

mep-or-mip.description: Configure MEP or MIP parameters of MEG.

local-mep-type.description: The type of local MEP, including source MEP, destination MEP and bidirection MEP(default:bidirection MEP).

local-mep-id.description: The identity of local MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

peer-mep-type.description: The type of peer MEP, including source MEP, destination MEP and bidirection MEP(default: bidirection MEP).

peer-mep-id.description: The identity of peer MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

cc-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CC function(default: disable).

cv-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CV function(default: disable).

cv-phb.description: The PHB value carried in CCM packets(default: cs7).

cv-period.description: The period carried in the CCM frame,including 3.33ms,10ms,100ms,1s,10s,1min and 10min(defaut: 3.33ms).

proactive-lm-enable.description: The switch for turning on/off proactive LM function(default: disable).

proactive-lm-type.description: The proactive LM type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

proactive-dm-enable.description: The switch for turning on/off proactive DM function(default: disable).

proactive-dm-type.description: Proactive DM type, inculding one-way and two-way(default: one-way).

proactive-dm-send-interval.description: The sending period of proactive DM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

proactive-dm-phb.description: The PHB value carried in DM packets(default: cs7).

proactive-dm-tlv-size.description: The TLV size of Proactive DM packets, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).

sd-status.description: The switch for turning on/off SD function(default: disable).

loss-pkt-threshold-mantissa.description: The configration of loss ratio threshold(This field displays the manitissa in E-notation,default: 5).

loss-pkt-threshold-exponent.description: The configration of loss ratio threshold(This field displays the exponent in E-notation, default: 5).

lck-status.description: The switch for turning on/off LCK function(default: disable).

csf-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CSF function(default: disable).

csf-phb.description: The PHB value carried in CSF packets(default: cs7).

icc-length.description: The value of ICC length, ranges from 1byte to 6byte(default: 6byte).

ccm-sd-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CCMSD function(default: disable).

pro-lmmlmr-enable.description: The switch for turning on/off proactive LMMLMR function(default: disable).

pro-lmmlmr-phb.description: The PHB value carried in LMMLMR packets(default: cs7).

pro-lmmlmr-phb-ex.description: The PHB value carried in LMMLMR packets(default: cs7).

pro-lmmlmr-period.description: The sending period of proactive LMMLMR packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

pro-lmmlmr-type.description: The proactive LMMLMR type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

oammapping-use-ccmstop.description: The CCM-STOP function is applied to the scene of local fault delivery(default: disable).

oammapping-use-rdi.description: This function is used to send RDI packet in the scene of local fault delivery(default: disable).

oam-packet-statistics.description: The switch for turning on/off fast OAM packet statistics function(default: disable).

mip-id.description: The identity of MIP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-up-or-down.description: The type of MIP, including down MIP and up MIP(default: down).

mip-interface.description: MIP interface. This parameter is not necessary. It must be physical interface if the interface is configured.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LB function.

mep-or-mip.description: Configure MEP or MIP parameters of LB.
Configure MEP or MIP parameters of LB.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-id.description: The identity of destination MIP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

mip-node.description: Configure node ID information of MIP.

node-id.description: The peer node ID is only applicable to standard mode.

node-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

if-number.description: The if-Number value of the destination MIP ID.

mip-none.description: Configure none flag information of MIP.

none-flag.description: The none flag which means having not taken with MIP ID is only applicable to standard mode.

none-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets, ranges from 5 to 10(default: 5).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of LB. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LB function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LB packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LB packets(default: cs7).

mode.description: The LB working model:standard model and private model of ZTE(default: ztemode).

send-limit-flag.description: The limit of sending speed in the function of LB, ranges from 1 to 10(default: 10). If this parameter is not configured, it means to send 10 packets per second.

pattern.description: The TLV value of LB function,from <0-9>,<a-f>or<A-F>.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LT function.

mep-or-ttl.description: Configure MEP or TTL parameters of LT.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

max-hop.description: Max hops in the function of LT, ranges from 1 to 255. This parameter indicates the max hops of LT function.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LT function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LT packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LT packets(default: cs7).

mode.description: The LT working model:standard model and private model of ZTE(default: ztemode).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off TST function.

type.description: The type of the TST function, including one-way-source and one-way-destination.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of TST. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of TST function, ranges from 0 to 1400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means TST packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in TST packets(default: cs7).

speed.description: The TST packet sending speed, ranges from 1 to 10000(units: kbps, default: 10000).

code-type.description: The type of TST TLV value, including all0 and all1(default: all0).

out-seg.description: The out-seg ID of TEST which has associated with the instance of P2MP ranges from 1 to 32.

service-type.description: The service type of TEST, including in-service and out-of-service(default:in-service).

lms.description: The operation of on-demand LM function.

lm.description: The operation of on-demand LM function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LM function.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LM packets(default: cs7).

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand LM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

type.description: The on-demand LM type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

dms.description: The operation of on-demand DM function.

dm.description: The operation of on-demand DM function.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in DM packets(default: cs7).

loss-pkt-threshold-mantissa.description: The configration of loss ratio threshold(This field displays the manitissa in E-notation,default: 5).

loss-pkt-threshold-exponent.description: The configration of loss ratio threshold(This field displays the exponent in E-notation, default: 5).

lck-status.description: The switch for turning on/off LCK function(default: disable).

csf-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CSF function(default: disable).

csf-phb.description: The PHB value carried in CSF packets(default: cs7).

icc-length.description: The value of ICC length, ranges from 1byte to 6byte(default: 6byte).

ccm-sd-status.description: The switch for turning on/off CCMSD function(default: disable).

pro-lmmlmr-enable.description: The switch for turning on/off proactive LMMLMR function(default: disable).

pro-lmmlmr-phb.description: The PHB value carried in LMMLMR packets(default: cs7).

pro-lmmlmr-phb-ex.description: The PHB value carried in LMMLMR packets(default: cs7).

pro-lmmlmr-period.description: The sending period of proactive LMMLMR packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

pro-lmmlmr-type.description: The proactive LMMLMR type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

oammapping-use-ccmstop.description: The CCM-STOP function is applied to the scene of local fault delivery(default: disable).

oammapping-use-rdi.description: This function is used to send RDI packet in the scene of local fault delivery(default: disable).

oam-packet-statistics.description: The switch for turning on/off fast OAM packet statistics function(default: disable).

mip-id.description: The identity of MIP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-up-or-down.description: The type of MIP, including down MIP and up MIP(default: down).

mip-interface.description: MIP interface. This parameter is not necessary. It must be physical interface if the interface is configured.

lb-results.description: The detail result information of LB function.

lb-result.description: The detail result information of LB function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

send-count.description: The count of sending LB packets.

recv-count.description: The count of receiving LB packets.

discard-count.description: The count of lossing LB packets.

result-status.description: The status of LB function, including not-ready, running and finished.

format-error-count.description: The count of receiving format error LB packets.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LB function.

mep-or-mip.description: Configure MEP or MIP parameters of LB.
Configure MEP or MIP parameters of LB.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-id.description: The identity of destination MIP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

mip-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

mip-node.description: Configure node ID information of MIP.

node-id.description: The peer node ID is only applicable to standard mode.

node-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

if-number.description: The if-Number value of the destination MIP ID.

mip-none.description: Configure none flag information of MIP.

none-flag.description: The none flag which means having not taken with MIP ID is only applicable to standard mode.

none-ttl.description: TTL value of the destination MIP ID in the function of LB.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets, ranges from 5 to 10(default: 5).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of LB. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LB function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LB packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LB packets(default: cs7).

mode.description: The LB working model:standard model and private model of ZTE(default: ztemode).

send-limit-flag.description: The limit of sending speed in the function of LB, ranges from 1 to 10(default: 10). If this parameter is not configured, it means to send 10 packets per second.

pattern.description: The TLV value of LB function,from <0-9>,<a-f>or<A-F>.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LT function.

mep-or-ttl.description: Configure MEP or TTL parameters of LT.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

max-hop.description: Max hops in the function of LT, ranges from 1 to 255. This parameter indicates the max hops of LT function.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LT function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LT packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LT packets(default: cs7).

mode.description: The LT working model:standard model and private model of ZTE(default: ztemode).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off TST function.

type.description: The type of the TST function, including one-way-source and one-way-destination.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of TST. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of TST function, ranges from 0 to 1400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means TST packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in TST packets(default: cs7).

speed.description: The TST packet sending speed, ranges from 1 to 10000(units: kbps, default: 10000).

code-type.description: The type of TST TLV value, including all0 and all1(default: all0).

out-seg.description: The out-seg ID of TEST which has associated with the instance of P2MP ranges from 1 to 32.

service-type.description: The service type of TEST, including in-service and out-of-service(default:in-service).

lm.description: The operation of on-demand LM function.

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand LM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

type.description: The on-demand LM type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LT function.

mep-or-ttl.description: Configure MEP or TTL parameters of LT.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

max-hop.description: Max hops in the function of LT, ranges from 1 to 255. This parameter indicates the max hops of LT function.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LT function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LT packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LT packets(default: cs7).

mode.description: The LT working model:standard model and private model of ZTE(default: ztemode).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

serial-number.description: Detecting instance serial number sending by network management by netconf.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LT function.

mep-or-ttl.description: Configure MEP or TTL parameters of LT.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

max-hop.description: Max hops in the function of LT, ranges from 1 to 255. This parameter indicates the max hops of LT function.

time-out.description: Timeout value of waiting responding packets.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of LT function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means LT packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LT packets(default: cs7).

mep-or-ttl.description: Configure MEP or TTL parameters of LT.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

max-hop.description: Max hops in the function of LT, ranges from 1 to 255. This parameter indicates the max hops of LT function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off TST function.

type.description: The type of the TST function, including one-way-source and one-way-destination.

mep-id.description: The identity of destination MEP, ranges from 1 to 8191.

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of TST. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of TST function, ranges from 0 to 1400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means TST packets will not carry TLV.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in TST packets(default: cs7).

speed.description: The TST packet sending speed, ranges from 1 to 10000(units: kbps, default: 10000).

code-type.description: The type of TST TLV value, including all0 and all1(default: all0).

out-seg.description: The out-seg ID of TEST which has associated with the instance of P2MP ranges from 1 to 32.

service-type.description: The service type of TEST, including in-service and out-of-service(default:in-service).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

type.description: The type of the TST function, including one-way-source and one-way-destination.

lms_schema.description: The operation of on-demand LM function.

lm.description: The operation of on-demand LM function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LM function.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LM packets(default: cs7).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of on-demand LM. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand LM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

type.description: The on-demand LM type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off LM function.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in LM packets(default: cs7).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of on-demand LM. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand LM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

type.description: The on-demand LM type, including G.8114 and Y.1731. G.8114, counting the data packets; Y.1731, counting the data packets and OAM packets(default: G.8114).

dms_schema.description: The operation of on-demand DM function.

dm.description: The operation of on-demand DM function.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off DM function.

type.description: On-demand DM type, inculding one-way and two-way.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in DM packets(default: cs7).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of on-demand DM. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand DM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of on-demand DM function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means DM packets will not carry TLV.

meg-index.description: The value of MEG index,the upper limit of this parameter depends on the device.

status.description: The switch for turning on/off DM function.

type.description: On-demand DM type, inculding one-way and two-way.

phb.description: The PHB value carried in DM packets(default: cs7).

send-time.description: Duration time in the function of on-demand DM. It ranges from 10s to 24h with the configration of permanence detecting. If this node assigned 0, it means permanence detecting unless mannual stopping. If assigned 10-86400, it means detecting lasting time.

send-interval.description: The sending period of on-demand DM packets, ranges from 1 to 100(units:100ms, default: 10).

tlv-size.description: The TLV size of on-demand DM function, ranges from 0 to 400(default: 0).If TLV size is 0, it means DM packets will not carry TLV.
